thread.section_title: Saatva Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatva Mattress | saatvamattress.com
thread.title: John Fabian
thread.title_full: Saatva Mattress reviewed by John Fabian

author: John Fabian
title: John Fabian
text: We will never buy a mattress any where else. This is our second purchase. We bought a bed several years back that is still in perfect condition and more recently purchased 2 more beds to replace in a couple of other rooms. The quality is top of the line and better then anything we have seen or purchased in the past. Customer service is light years ahead of any other store or ware house out their. The delivery company they use is also very professional and efficient. The cherry on top is that their made in the USA. Love recommending to friends and family because I know they are going to be taken care of and happy!
